1.title: Up to the Mountain
1.plot: Pint size but full of life, Heidi, a young orphan with curly brown hair and as cute as a button, is taken to live with her grandfather, a silent and solitary old man, in the Swiss Alps. Her new life is very challenging and living in the mountains can be harsh, but Heidi is going muster up courage and strength and prove that she can be right at home.

3.title: The Challenge
3.plot: Heid is a young girl living with her grandfather in the Swiss Mountains. Follow Heidi as she becomes a goat general and moves to the city.

8.title: Trapped in the Manor
8.plot: Winter has arrived and now Heidi is stuck in the cabin. She asks Grandfather to go to the village to see Peter after school. Grandfather agrees and she goes down to the village on Grandfather's sled. She peers inside the classroom and observes Peter. After school, Peter and Heidi are attacked with snowballs by Karl and Theresa, who blame Peter for having being punished by the teacher.

14.title: Clara
14.plot: In Frankfurt, Clara Sesemann, a young girl in a wheelchair, waits impatiently for her new companion; Heidi. But when Heidi arrives at the Sesemann's house, Miss Rottenmeier, the governess in charge, wants to make sure that Heidi is suitable for Clara before she can meet the young girl.

Her new life is very challenging and living in the mountains can be harsh, but Heidi is going muster up courage and strength and prove that she can be right at home.

16.title: The Promise
16.plot: Heidi must save the two kittens from an awful fate.

17.title: Papa Returns
17.plot: Pint size but full of life, Heidi, a young orphan with curly brown hair and as cute as a button, is taken to live with her grandfather, a silent and solitary old man, in the Swiss Alps. Her new life is very challenging and living in the mountains can be harsh, but Heidi is going muster up courage and strength and prove that she can be right at home.

18.title: Home Schooled
18.plot: Clara's teacher comes back after the holidays, and he also has to teach Heidi. But he realizes that she doesn't even know how to read and write. When the girls are threatened to have separate classes, which means they won't see each other at all during the day, Clara helps Heidi learn her alphabet.

22.title: Goats in the City
22.plot: Miss Rottenmeier has to leave town to see her sick sister and Dete and Sebastian are left in charge (Grandmamma had to leave too). Heidi convinces them to take her and Clara back to the park. At the park, Heidi and Clara see some goats in an enclosure and Heidi notices that one of the baby goats is sick and needs attention.

Her new life is very challenging and living in the mountains can be harsh, but Heidi is going muster up courage and strength and prove that she can be right at home.

26.title: The Letter
26.plot: Heidi is eagerly waiting for Grandfather's reply but no letter comes for her. This distresses her so much that she starts to faint every now and then. Everybody is worried and the doctor says that she should avoid to be reminded of the mountains for a while or be sent back to the mountains.

31.title: The School Test
31.plot: Mr Traber, the teacher, organizes a test at school for the end of term. Karl, Theresa, William and Peter have to pass it, but not Heidi, as she is in the small section. The best student will receive a book and a coin. Theresa wants to beat Peter, who is now a good student, thanks to Heidi's help and advice from her time in Frankfurt with Grandmamma.

38.title: Forgiven
38.plot: Mr Sesemann comes to Dörfli with Grandmamma for a visit. When he sees them, Peter thinks they're after him for breaking the wheelchair and he decides to run away. At the cabin, everyone's happiness (as Mr Sesemann and Grandmamma have seen Clara walk) is short-lived when Brigitte arrives and tells them that Peter is gone. They all look for Peter and Heidi finds him in the treehouse.

39.title: Edelweiss

imdb.plot outline: Heidi is a little girl who is full of beans. She faces many problems up in the Swiss alps whilst living with her grandfather. Heidi lights up and soothes the people and animals all around her, with her enthusiastic, generous and wonderful zest for life. This bubbly, young orphan girl will learn the priceless value of friendship and mutual respect. Follow her journey as she dicovers life's ups and downs.
imdb.title: Heidi
plot: _Heidi_ (qv) is a little girl who is full of beans. She faces many problems up in the Swiss alps whilst living with her grandfather. _Heidi_ (qv) lights up and soothes the people and animals all around her, with her enthusiastic, generous and wonderful zest for life. This bubbly, young orphan girl will learn the priceless value of friendship and mutual respect. Follow her journey as she dicovers life's ups and downs.
